short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Drip the droplet into your Nordium.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save a Link to Nordium

This is the official Nordium extension developed and maintained by the official team. With the Nordium extension, you can easily save a link to Nordium with just one click. You can then read your saved links in Nordium, take notes, and build your storage of links (called droplets) to create collections (called oceans) to share with your friends.

* Save a link to Nordium.
* Share droplets with anyone you want.
* Build your knowledge base on Nordium.

> Note: You must have an existing Nordium account to use this extension.
